lines.text: He's bleeding!
I don't bleed.
Where the fuck did you come from?
Big Bang? Primordial ooze? Divine hands of a benevolent creator? All possibilities, but recent events have given me doubts about the benevolent creator.
[after Dutton shot Corvis]
That was a fucking hollow point!
I guess that it's true. Guns don't kill people.
[lashes out his blade]
You think... you think maybe knives do.
The dead can return given sufficent motivation.

[a baby starts to cry]
Can you turn that baby down?

[holds up the knife that was used to kill Lauren]
I heard you were looking for this.
You're the guy who killed Dutton!
The way I see it, I want you think of me as the guy who killed you.
Two down, two to go.

The jolt - eight amps at two to three-thousand volts. It lasts a few seconds. The current surges and is turned off. And they check to see if the heart is still beating. If it is... Ba-Boom! Another jolt is applied. Experts say unconsciousness occurs before pain has time to register. They agree that electrocution does not hurt. But it does. Unimaginably... Believe me... I... don't expect a call from the governor. Any last words... Captain?
Yeah, fuck you.
Was that it?

I'm not dying for your goddamn illusion, you got that? You think you and your girlfriend had some rosy future taken from you? Bullshit! She was already bored. Why do you think she was lookin' around? You're nothing, Corvis. Less than nothing! You can't do this to me, you little fucks! You hear me? You understand? I'll be back! Just like you! A big, fucking, shit-spewing bird! And guess which little bitch I'm taking out first!
You are so dead.
[Screams after Alex pushes the knife deeper into his leg through his hand]
What do you want?
I want Lauren. I want my life back. I want to know why!
I want to see you bend over... Officer Dutton.

[girl screams after Alex's head hit the window]
You're up!

[to Toomey]
Gas, spark, bad combination.
